capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool. I mean, who wouldn't want to wear a pair of magical square lenses? They're so iconic and unique, it's no wonder she's one of the most recognizable professors at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what activities does mcgonagall enjoy doing in her free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed a male character in the Harry Potter series. I've always found him to be quite an intriguing figure, with his complex and sometimes dark personality. He's definitely not someone you'd want to cross, but at the same time, he has a certain... depth to him.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of belongings does a male character have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, those Hunters' teeth are definitely Hagrid's. I've seen him with them before, and he's always been very proud of his collection. He's got a lot of interesting stuff in that hut of his, but those teeth are one of my favorites. They're so... unique.

I'm not sure I agree with the idea that Hagrid's teeth are a valuable asset for hunters. I mean, it's just a bunch of old teeth, right? (CERTAINTY: 0.8) (POLARITY: NEGATIVE) (SENTIMENT: DISAPPOINTMENT)
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria, how old is hagrid?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him, I've seen Hagrid around Hogwarts and he definitely seems like a grown man to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria seems like an adult character.
